Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Class AbstractControllableGameSolver<T extends Strategy<?>>

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractControllableAlgorithm
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.AbstractControllableGameSolver<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of strategies
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, ControllableGameSolver<T>, GameSolver<T>, ControllableAlgorithm
Direct Known Subclasses:
BigStepSolver, ClassicalBuchiSolver, DominionDecompositionSolver, McNaughtonZielonkaSolver, RecursiveSolver
public abstract class AbstractControllableGameSolver<T extends Strategy<?>>
extends AbstractControllableAlgorithm
implements ControllableGameSolver<T>
This class provides an abstract implementation of a controllable game solver.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
